Index.title: LinkLockr - Secure Paid Links with Smart Contracts
Index.description: Sell access to your digital content
Index.description_unused: Create and share paid links securely using blockchain technology. LinkLockr enables content creators to monetize their links with ease and security.
Index.modalDescription: LinkLockr encrypts your text, stores it on IPFS, then unencrypts and delivers it upon payment. No traditional financial intermediaries, just you and your audience.
Index.step1_desc: Enter the URL or text you want to sell.
Index.step2_desc: Displayed in US Dollars, paid in Etheruem on the Base chain.
Index.step3_desc: Enter a custom purchase link or use an auto-generated one.
Index.TODO: TODO: link fee percentage should be from .env.local
Index.step4_desc: Payments are instantly sent to your connected wallet on the Base chain. Platform/network fees (~{percent}%) apply.
Index.linkCreated_desc: Your content is encrypted on IPFS and the slug is registered on Base.
Index.linkCreated_desc_unused: Your paid link is ready. Share it with your audience to start earning!
